items.name: Component_CharacterBehavior
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_CharacterBehavior
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_CharacterBehavior extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    * 
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        @setupEventHandlers()
        
    ###*
    * A behavior-component which handles the character-specific behavior like
    * talking and idle.
    *
    * @module vn
    * @class Component_CharacterBehavior
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof vn
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: () ->
        super

        ###*
        * @property imageIndex
        * @type number
        * @private
        ###
        @imageIndex = 0
        
        ###*
        * @property imageDuration
        * @type number
        * @private
        ###
        @imageDuration = 30
        
        ###*
        * @property idleTime
        * @type number
        * @private
        ###
        
        @idleTime = 120 + 120 * Math.random()
        ###*
        * Indicates if the character is currently talking.
        * @property talking
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @talking = no
      
        ###*
        * @property initialized
        * @type boolean
        * @private
        ###
        @initialized = no
        
        ###*
        * Temporary game settings used by this character.
        * @property imageIndex
        * @type number
        ###
        @tempSettings = GameManager.tempSettings
        
    ###*
    * Adds event-handlers
    *
    * @method setupEventHandlers
    ### 
    setupEventHandlers: ->
        gs.GlobalEventManager.on "talkingStarted", (e) => 
            if e.character?.index == @object.rid
                @object.talking = yes
                @imageIndex = 0
        gs.GlobalEventManager.on "talkingEnded", (e) => 
            if e.character?.index == @object.rid
                @object.talking = no
                @imageIndex = 0
                
    ###*
    * Initializes the component. Adds event-handlers.
    *
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @initialized = yes
        @setupEventHandlers()
        @update()
    
    ###*
    * Changes the characters expression using blending. If the duration is set
    * to 0 the expression change is executed immediately without animation.
    *
    * @method changeExpression
    * @param {vn.CharacterExpression} expression - The character expression database-record.
    * @param {number} duration - The animation-duration in frames. Pass 0 to skip animation.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback-function called when the change is finished. 
    ###
    changeExpression: (expression, animation, easing, duration, callback) ->
        prevExpression = @object.expression
        @object.expression = expression
        
        if prevExpression?.idle?.length > 0 and @object.expression? and prevExpression != @object.expression
            @imageIndex = 0

            picture = new gs.Object_Picture()
            picture.imageFolder = "Graphics/Characters"
            picture.image = prevExpression.idle[0].resource.name
            picture.update()
            picture.dstRect.x = @object.dstRect.x + Math.round((@object.dstRect.width - picture.dstRect.width) / 2)
            picture.dstRect.y = @object.dstRect.y + Math.round((@object.dstRect.height - picture.dstRect.height) / 2)
            picture.zIndex = @object.zIndex - 1
            picture.zoom.x = @object.zoom.x
            picture.zoom.y = @object.zoom.y
            picture.update()
            
            
            @object.parent.addObject(picture)
            
            switch animation.fading
                when 0 # Overlay
                    @object.animator.appear(@object.dstRect.x, @object.dstRect.y, animation, easing, duration, () ->
                        picture.dispose()
                        callback?()
                    )
                    @object.update()
                when 1 # Cross Fade
                    picture.animator.disappear(animation, easing, duration, (object) -> 
                        object.dispose())
                    picture.update()
                    
                    @object.animator.appear(@object.dstRect.x, @object.dstRect.y, animation, easing, duration, (object) -> 
                        callback?())
                    @object.update()
        else
            callback?()
            
     
    ###*
    * Lets the character start talking.
    *
    * @method startTalking
    ###       
    startTalking: -> @object.talking = yes
    
    ###*
    * Lets the character stop with talking.
    *
    * @method stopTalking
    ###
    stopTalking: -> @object.talking = no
    
    ###*
    * Updates character's talking-animation.
    *
    * @method updateTalking
    * @protected
    ###
    updateTalking: ->
        if @tempSettings.skip and @object.expression.talking?.length > 0
            @object.talking = no
            @imageIndex = 0
            @object.image = @object.expression.talking[@imageIndex].resource.name
        else if @object.expression?
            if @object.expression.talking?.length > 0
                @imageDuration--
                if @imageDuration <= 0
                    imageIndex = @imageIndex
                    while imageIndex == @imageIndex and @object.expression.talking.length > 1
                        @imageIndex = Math.round(Math.random() * (@object.expression.talking.length-1))
                    speed = @object.expression.talkingSpeed / 100 * 5
                    @imageDuration = speed + Math.round(speed * Math.random())
                @object.image = @object.expression.talking[@imageIndex].resource.name
            else
                @updateIdle()
     
    ###*
    * Updates character's idle-animation.
    *
    * @method updateIdle
    * @protected
    ###       
    updateIdle: ->
        if @object.expression? and @object.expression.idle?.length > 0
            if @imageDuration <= 0
                @idleTime--
                if @idleTime <= 0
                    @idleTime = @object.expression.idleTime.start + (@object.expression.idleTime.end - @object.expression.idleTime.start) * Math.random()
                    @imageDuration = @object.expression.idleSpeed / 100 * 5
            
            if @imageDuration > 0
                @imageDuration--
                if @imageDuration <= 0
                    @imageIndex++
                    if @imageIndex >= @object.expression.idle.length
                        @imageIndex = 0
                        @imageDuration = 0
                    else
                        @imageDuration = @object.expression.idleSpeed / 100 * 5
            @object.image = @object.expression.idle[@imageIndex].resource.name
    
    ###*
    * Updates character logic & animation-handling.
    *
    * @method update
    ###                   
    update: ->
        super
        if not @initialized then @setup()
        
        if @object.talking
            @updateTalking()
        else
            @updateIdle()
        
        
        
vn.Component_CharacterBehavior = Component_CharacterBehavior
